content.rendered:
Loan Operations Coordinator | Tulsa,  OK     Essential Duties and Responsibilities include the following:
  • Reconcile daily loan activity to general ledger.
  • Process daily loan payments and advances.
  • Process daily lockbox receipts and sweeps.
  • Input new loans and letters of credit to Core Computer System.
  • Process loan modifications, extensions, and deferrals.
  • Process loan account maintenance as required.
  • Setup and maintain insurance and tax escrow accounts and process payments to insurance companies and County Treasurers
  • Compile and distribute daily loan report to Loan Officers.
  • Compile and maintain credit files and records.
  • Compile and maintain letter of credit files and records.
  • Assist Loan Officers with system reports as requested.
 
  • This is a Full-Time position, compensation will depend on experience
  • Qualified candidate with have previous experience working in Loans/Loan coordination
  • High School GED or College Degree is preferred
